== Video Overview ==

This screencast targets the new user to Ubuntu who is unfamiliar with the filesystem layout. The screencast outlines the key critical locations within the filesystem and at a high level, what files are in them. 

== Target Audience ==

* Users

== Pre-requisites ==

* None

== Required Knowledge ==

* An understanding of the difference between files and folders/directories.

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* None

== Objectives ==

* Outline the main directories used by Ubuntu
* Provide examples of files or types of files that may be found in the main directories
* Explain why some specific directories are writable by certain users and not others
